title: The Best of The Herd
itunes:title: The Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Doug Gottlieb fills in to explain why Lamar Jackson is not worthy of a Pro Bowl selection this season. He discusses the Cardinals regressing in the second half of the season in back to back years and what this says about their young franchise QB Kyler Murray. He also tells you which team in the NFC is ready to make another push for the Super Bowl. Plus, Army head coach Jeff Monken joins the show to talk about their bowl win over Mizzou and what's different about coaching at a service academy as opposed to a regular university.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
